MLB prepared to ban A-Rod for life

Major League Baseball is threatening to kick Alex Rodriguez out of the game for life unless the New York Yankees star agrees not to fight a lengthy suspension for his role in baseball’s latest drug scandal, according to a person familiar with the discussions.

The bipartisan bill would reduce the costs of borrowing for millions of students and is now headed to President Obama for his signature.

Deputy, prisoner shot in hospital struggle

A prisoner being guarded at Mass. Eye and Ear Infirmary tried to grab a gun from one of the deputies, injuring him before being shot by the second deputy.

While many locals have to compete in the bloody sport of trying to find a place for a Sept. 1 move, college kids have almost-guaranteed places to live in at excellent locations with spectacular views.
